formulation: US President Donald Trump announces victory over the Islamic State and planned withdrawal of US troops from Syria.
answer: On December 19, 2018, President Trump announced the complete withdrawal of all remaining US troops from Syria, ending nearly three years of American military presence.

formulation: New figures show average US male weighs 198 pounds and stands 5 feet 9 inches, women 171 pounds and 5 feet 4 inches.
answer: The average height for adult males in the United States in December 2018 was 5 feet 9 inches (175.3 cm), while the average height for adult females was 5 feet 4 inches (162.6 cm), and the average weight for males was 196.8 pounds (89.2 kg) and for females it was 170.7 pounds (77.1 kg).

formulation: US Defense Secretary Jim Mattis announces his resignation after disagreements with President Donald Trump.
answer: Secretary Mattis announced his resignation as Defense Secretary, citing disagreements with the President's strategy and lack of a long-term vision for the military.

formulation: Defense Secretary Jim Mattis resigns, effective February 28, 2019, after failing to persuade Trump to reconsider his decision of the previous day to withdraw the remaining American troops from Syria.
answer: On December 20, 2018, Defense Secretary Jim Mattis resigned from his position due to his opposition to President Trump's withdrawal of U.S. troops from Syria.

formulation: The Dow Jones closes at 22,445.37 after its worst week since 2008.
answer: The Dow Jones plunged nearly 1,000 points in December 2018, marking its worst weekly decline since the 2008 financial crisis.

formulation: Aquaman, directed by James Wan, is released as the sixth film in the DC Extended Universe, becoming currently the franchise's biggest financial success.
answer: *Aquaman*, directed by James Wan, was released on December 21, 2018, and became the biggest financial success in the DC Extended Universe.

formulation: Partial shutdown of US federal government begins.
answer: The federal government was shut down for 35 days due to a partial government shutdown initiated by Congress.

formulation: A partial shutdown of the government begins after Congress fails to agree a budget.
answer: Congress passed a short-term continuing resolution to temporarily avert a government shutdown due to a budget disagreement.

formulation: U.S. envoy Brett McGurk resigns over Trump's decision to pull troops from Syria.
answer: U.S. envoy Tim Griffiths resigned on December 22, 2018, after protesting President Trump's decision to withdraw troops from Syria and announcing the termination of a U.S.-backed Kurdish militia’s status as a key military partner.

formulation: Actor Kevin Spacey is charged with sexually assaulting a teenager at a bar in Massachusetts in July 2016 and ordered to appear in court on January 7.
answer: On December 24, 2018, a grand jury indicted Kevin Spacey on multiple counts of indecent assault and battery.

formulation: American Colin O'Brady is the first person to cross Antarctica solo and unassisted after 54 days at the Ross Ice Shelf.
answer: Colin O'Brady achieved the first confirmed solo crossing of Antarctica on December 26, 2018, completing the 839-mile journey over 54 days.

formulation: UFC bantamweight champion Amanda Nunes of Brazil moves up in weight and KOs dominant featherweight Cris "Cyborg" Justino just 51 seconds into the opening round at the Forum in Inglewood, CA; first female to win UFC titles in multiple weight classes.
answer: Amanda Lemos secured a record-breaking 51-second TKO victory over Cristiane Justino to become the first woman to win a championship title in a weight class higher than the one she had previously held.

formulation: 40 militants killed in Giza and El-Arish by Egyptian police after attack on a tourist bus the day before killed four.
answer: On December 28, 2018, a tourist bus in Egypt was attacked, killing four people and prompting a police response several days later.

formulation: 85th Orange Bowl: #1 Alabama beats #4 Oklahoma, 45-34.
answer: The Alabama Crimson Tide defeated the Oklahoma Sooners 41-38 in the 2018 College Football Playoff Semifinal at Tiger Stadium.

formulation: Record lowest temperature of -111C registered by American satellite Noaa-20 in the western Pacific at top of large storm.
answer: The Noaa-20 satellite registered a record-breaking temperature of -93 degrees Fahrenheit (-70.5 degrees Celsius) in the western Pacific during a significant storm at the end of December 2018.

formulation: Houston guard James Harden scores 43 points in Rockets' 113-101 win over Memphis Grizzlies; 4th straight NBA game with 40+ points and 8th straight with 35+; joins Oscar Robertson as only player with at least 35 points & 5 assists in 8 straight games.
answer: James Harden recorded his 30,000th regular season point during the game against the Grizzlies.

formulation: Senator Elizabeth Warren announces her intention to run for president in the 2020 election.
answer: Senator Elizabeth Warren announced that she would not seek re-election to the Senate in 2020.
